code: import axios from"axios";var Api_Key="cf672d5af5b5025e48ee79a16a4e6a9f";export function movies(data){var request=axios({method:"get",url:"https://api.themoviedb.org/3/movie/popular?api_key=".concat(Api_Key,"&language=en-US&page=1"),data:data});return function(dispatch){request.then(function(response){dispatch({type:"movieList",payload:response.data.results});}).catch();};}export function tvShowsF(data){var request=axios({method:"get",url:"https://api.themoviedb.org/3/tv/popular?api_key=".concat(Api_Key,"&language=en-US&page=1"),data:data});return function(dispatch){request.then(function(response){dispatch({type:"tvList",payload:response.data.results});}).catch();};}export function request(num){var req=axios({method:"get",url:"https://api.themoviedb.org/3/movie/popular?api_key=cf672d5af5b5025e48ee79a16a4e6a9f&language=en-US&page=".concat(num)});return function(dispatch){req.then(function(response){dispatch({type:"moreMovies",payload:response.data.results});}).catch();};}export function requestShow(num){var req=axios({method:"get",url:"https://api.themoviedb.org/3/tv/popular?api_key=cf672d5af5b5025e48ee79a16a4e6a9f&language=en-US&page=".concat(num)});return function(dispatch){req.then(function(response){dispatch({type:"moreShows",payload:response.data.results});}).catch();};}export function setMovieIndex(id){return{type:"setMovieIndex",payload:id};}export function setShowIndex(id){return{type:"setShowIndex",payload:id};}
